title: Transporte Aereo: Economia e Politicas Publicas
abstract: This book, written in Portuguese, presents a comprehensive analysis of the air transport industry in Brazil, highlighting its vital importance to the country's economy. It explores the sector's complexity, from economic characteristics to interaction with the national aeronautical industry, through the specialization of the workforce and market demand analysis. The book delves into the economic regulation of air transport, tracing the evolution from periods of strict regulation to phases of liberalization and deregulation, and examines market dynamics, focusing on concentration and competitiveness. It also analyzes demand and supply through case studies, investigating everything from tourists traveling within Brazil to the coverage of the national territory and the prices of air tickets. translated_title: 航空运输：经济和公共政策
translated_abstract: 本书以葡萄牙语撰写，全面分析了巴西的航空运输业，着重强调其对国家经济的重要性。它探讨了该行业的复杂性，从经济特征到与国内航空工业的互动，通过劳动力的专业化和市场需求分析。本书深入研究了航空运输的经济监管，并追溯了严格监管时期到自由化和取消监管阶段的演变，同时还分析了市场动态，重点关注集中度和竞争力。它还通过案例研究分析了需求和供应，调查了从巴西国内旅游者到国土覆盖和航空票价的各个方面。最后，本书提出了航空部门的监管原则和公共政策，强调乘客优先、商业环境、航空运输的可获得性和经济效益。
tldr: 这本书全面分析了巴西航空运输业的经济和公共政策，并强调了其对国家经济的重要性。它研究了航空运输的经济特征、与国内航空工业的互动、市场动态和需求分析，以及航空运输的监管原则和公共政策。
en_tdlr: This book provides a comprehensive analysis of the economic aspects and public policies of the air transport industry in Brazil, emphasizing its vital importance to the country's economy. It examines the economic characteristics, interaction with the domestic aerospace industry, market dynamics, and demand analysis of air transport, as well as proposing regulatory principles and public policies for the sector.
